title: IDA pro CTRL and + keypad whenever debugging
content:
How can I remove the CTRL and + keypad whenever I am debugging PE file in IDA?
All of the disassembled codes are wrapped up whenever I debug a PE file and I see the message CTRL and + keypad to collapse the code. How can I remove that mode so I have all the code collapsed down while debugging in the first place?

comments.text: I'm not sure if i understand the question. But when debugging, you generally need all code expanded, because IDA won't be able to show the current instruction otherwise.

answers_data.content:
In the Browser tab of IDA's Options window, check Unhide collapsed items automatically when jumping to them:
